ori_caption: Figure 6.3: The door sensor generates a packet as soon as it detects the door is open. The spike in the fast Fourier transform of the analog signal shows a single transmission using OOK modulation.
title: Addressing Security and Privacy Challenges in Internet of Things
level_0_normalized_caption: the door sensor generates a packet as soon as it detects the door is open .
the spike in the fast fourier transform of the analog signal shows a single transmission using ook modulation .
